p.codeblock: public static synchronized RtcEngine create(Context context, String appId, IRtcEngineEventHandler handler) throws Exception

section.p: All methods in the class are executed asynchronously. Agora recommends calling these methods in the same thread.

ul.li: You must call this method to create a instance before calling any other APIs.
You can create a instance by calling this method or . Compared to this method, supports more configurations, such as specifying the region and setting the log file.
Each app supports creating only one instance.

plentry.pd: The context of the Android Activity.

The App ID issued by Agora for your project. Only users with the same App ID can join the same channel and communicate. An App ID can only be used to create one instance. To change the App ID, call to destroy the current instance before creating a new one.

section.title: Return Values
section.p: If the method call succeeds, returns an initialized instance. If the method call fails, the SDK throws an exception and returns the corresponding error message. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly.
